name: Don'tgeon
description:
What is wrong with this place? It doesn’t feel like home anymore… Let’s get out of here. Defeat your enemies and find the way out, discover the map and reach new abilities. Don’tgeon is a dungeon crawl game with an isometric view. You can find the controls guide on the menu!

CREDITS 

Victor Zaragoza - Developer & Combat Designer

Emma Quer - 3D Artist & Producer

Álvaro Rodríguez - Level Designer & 3D Artist

Carlos Serrano - Animator & Developer
